full_summary:
# Construction Utility Vehicle Tender

## Title

* English: **CONSTRUCTION UTILITY VEHICLE**
* French: **VÉHICLE UTILITAIRE DE CONSTRUCTION**

## Tender Information

* Reference Number: **PW-23-01029282**
* Solicitation Number: **W8476-236677/A**
* Publication Date: **2023-03-07**
* Tender Closing Date: **2023-04-27T14:00:00**

## Tender Status

The tender is now EXPIRED.

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: **General Departmental (GD)**
* Notice Type: **Request for Proposal (RFP)**
* Procurement Method: **Competitive - Open Bidding**

## Industry Classification

* GSIN (NIBC) ID: **N3805**
* Description: **Earthmoving and Excavating Equipment (Équipement de terrassement et d'excavation)**

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to trade suppliers that have an agreement with Canada.

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Regions

* Regions of Opportunity: **Canada**
* Regions of Delivery: **Canada**

## Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name: **Department of National Defence (Ministère de la Défense nationale)**
* Contracting Entity Address: **101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2**

## Contact Information

* Contact Person: **Genevieve Roach**
* Contact Email: **genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca**
* Notice URL: **None**

## Attachments

Download the tender notice and supporting documents from the following links:

* [EN] <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/07/e4cbc88a6e89cde757884a408c7391bf/en_rfp_w8476-236677-a_original.pdf>
* [FR] <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/07/0a2fae88bd5efa12fad71dc74a53982a/fr_ddp_w8476-236
